Name: Matt Rosendale
SummaryLine: Incumbent U.S. Representative for Montana at-large
LongSummary:
This is a place for a 2-3 summary of a candidate's backgound, candidacy etc. Plan is to display it on candidate page but not overview page. Separate from SummaryLine, which is intended to be a one-clause description w/ name + profession details.

articles.title: Bipartisan old guard lines up behind independent U.S. House candidate
articles.excerpt: Businessman Gary Buchanan of Billings, challenging Rep. Matt Rosendale for Montanaâ€™s eastern congressional district U.S. House seat, touts support from political figures who were among the most prominent Montana Republicans and Democrats in the 1990s and 2000s.

articles.title: Congressional races up and running
articles.excerpt: Candidates running for seats in the U.S. House of Representatives have filed their requisite paperwork as of 5 p.m. Monday, bringing the tally of active candidates up to nine Republicans, six Democrats, four Libertarians and one Independent.
